params.returnTokenToUser: true if the token should be returned to the user
params.tokenId: id of the token to close

returns.amount0CollectedFee: uint256 amount of token0 collected fee
returns.amount0Removed: uint256 amount of token0 removed from liquidity
returns.amount1CollectedFee: uint256 amount of token1 collected fee
returns.amount1Removed: uint256 amount of token1 removed from liquidity

PositionClosed(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: emitted when a UniswapNFT position is closed
